options.text: A partnership between two different species that benefits both

options.label: C
options.text: A type of competition between species

options.text: A type of ecosystem

options.text: Clark's nutcracker and the whitebark pine

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.text: The evolution of other symbiotic relationships

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential benefit of considering the concept of infinity in our understanding of the universe?

options.label: A

options.label: C
options.text: It can lead to new perspectives on the nature of reality

options.label: D
options.text: It can help us appreciate the complexity of the cosmos
